name: Needed Failure
description:
*If the HTML build doesn't load or is too laggy, please download the executables*

The world is falling apart! It seems some estrange creatures are seeping through the cracks as we speak. Escape this nightmarish landscape! Maybe if we take a leap of faith...

A game made in 72 hours for the Wowie Game Jam, Failure is Progress. You have to clear as many enemies as you can. Or do you? Follow your instincts and you'll fail. Good luck!

Controls

You can either use mouse and keyboard, or just mouse (In-game tutorial). Limited touch support.

Credit

Code&Art by me during the Jam (either from scratch or modified from earlier projects)

Font from (https://www.dafont.com/es/8-bit-arcade.font) by Ansimuz

Music from (https://freemusicarchive.org/music/jim-hall/synth-kid-elsewhere/hope-is-not-lost) by Jim Hall

Sound Effects from (youtube.com/watch?v=mAbG8Oi-SvQ) by HeartBeast
